text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump POTUS inherited a strong economy & drove it into the ground with a delayed and then bungled COVID-19 response, which is still bungling along by POTUS. 

Given POTUS’ inability to manage his way out of a wet paper bag, there’s no way he will rebuild the country. He has no skills.
